library-construction-16s-rrna-based_libr: used a series of vectors (pHOS) containing BstXI cloning sites that include several features: (1) the sequencing primer sites immediately flank the BstXI cloning site to avoid excessive resequencing of vector DNA; (2) elimination of strong promoters oriented toward the cloning site; and (3) the use of BstXI sites for cloning facilitates the preparation of libraries with a low incidence of no-insert clones and a high frequency of single inserts.
library-construction-16s-rrna-based_pcr_: DNA was randomly sheared via nebulization, end-polished with consecutive BAL31 nuclease and T4 DNA polymerase treatments
project-description_metagenome_name: GS033 Shotgun - Hypersaline - Galapagos Islands - Punta Cormorant, Hypersaline Lagoon, Floreana Island - Ecuador
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: 40-200 l of seawater, depending on the turbidity of the water, was pumped through a 20-μm nytex prefilter into a 250-l carboy. From this sample, two 20-ml subsamples were collected in acid-washed polyethylene bottles and frozen (−20 °C) for nutrient and particle analysis. At each station the biological material was size fractionated into individual samples by serial filtration through 20-μm, 3-μm, 0.8-μm, and 0.1-μm filters that were then sealed and stored at −20 °C until transport back to the laboratory.
sample-origin_location: Punta Cormorant, Hypersaline Lagoon, Floreana Island
sequences_sequences_filtered: The genome length was artificially set at the length of the dataset divided by 50 to allow unitigs of abundant organisms to be treated as unique
